name: Tooth Break Demo
description:
Power Ups:

Lollypop Ammo == Lets you shoot Lollies

Toothbrush == Shrinks you

Stroopwafel == Normal size

1UP Cherry == Adds a life

You play as a Sugar    use his tongue   to bounce candy at candy blocks and teeth. Don't get brushed, and knock out those teeth with sweets.

This is my first Game Jam game, It has been a rewarding two weeks. I would like to thank everyone on ___ Thank you for helping me along the way with answers and helpful tips.

The Game Jam added a lot of critical thinking and attention to detail, when it comes to coding and pixel art.

I made all the art from scratch, the main menu music I made using Sonic Pi (a coding language that makes music). Also roped my girlfriend into helping me with the voice bit and SFX for a crunch.

The levels one and two are by LEMMiNO songs being:

Aloft:
https://soundcloud.com/lemmino/aloft

Blackout:
https://soundcloud.com/lemmino/blackout

The songs are free to use as they are under Creative Commons as long as you credit LEMMiNO (his videos are awesome too! check out his Top10Facts)

I had a lot of fun making this, I hope you all have fun playing and let me know what you liked. Also you can download it for windows =)

Disclaimer of Bugs:

There are a few known unknown bugs I found, the ammo number may glitch to a not accurate number. These don't happen all the time but to be aware. 

Thank you for understanding. Have Fun!
